description: Structured information describing an anatomical entity (term).

nameOfLocation._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this anatomical entity based on anatomical location or characteristics.

otherAnatomicalRelations._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entity relation(s) to this anatomical entity describing its relation to other anatomical entities.

parentStructure._instruction: Add another anatomical entity to which this anatomical entity is part of.

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this anatomical entity.
